organizarion.name: Aon Centre for Innovation and Analytics (ACIA)
paragraph: Aon Centre for Innovation and Analytics in Dublin delivers data-driven insights to clients by leveraging Aon's unmatched data capabilities across both risk and people solutions.

organizarion.name: Wolk Software Ltd.
paragraph: Wolk Software is a software development company that want to not just deliver high quality software but to create software that add value to peoples lives and business through innovation, open-source and cloud technologies.

organizarion.name: Moneymate Ltd.
paragraph: MoneyMate is a specialist provider of investment product information  management solutions to global asset managers like State Street or JP Morgan.

organizarion.name: Club Travel Ltd.
paragraph: Club Travel has been established for more than 35 years and is the single largest travel management company in Ireland.

organizarion.name: GuadalTech
paragraph: GuadalTech Technologic Services is one of the leading IT companies in Seville. They deliver software consulting and outsourced managed services for multi-national companies like Heineken.

organizarion.name: Lucca Leadership
paragraph: Lucca Leadership is a global charity that aims to uplift communities all over the world by developing new generations of transformational leaders.
